title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements. Conduct stakeholder interviews, research existing supply chain systems, and document functional and non-functional requirements.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the blockchain network, smart contracts, and integration with existing e-commerce platforms.

title: Blockchain Network Setup
description: Set up the blockchain network, including node configuration, consensus mechanism, and network governance.

title: Smart Contract Development
description: Develop smart contracts for supply chain tracking, product authentication, and data storage on the blockchain.

title: E-commerce Platform Integration
description: Integrate the blockchain-based supply chain tracking system with existing e-commerce platforms, including APIs and user interfaces.

title: Data Management and Analytics
description: Implement data management and analytics capabilities for supply chain data stored on the blockchain, including reporting and visualization tools.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the system adheres to relevant security standards and regulatory compliance requirements, including data privacy and access control mechanisms.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and implement a comprehensive testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end testing for the entire system.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment pipeline, infrastructure provisioning, and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes for the blockchain network and e-commerce platform integration.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Develop comprehensive documentation for the system, including user guides, technical documentation, and training materials for stakeholders and end-users.
